projects.name: Graduation thesis
projects.description: Research work on the ways of harnessing nuclear energy. Reviewing diferent types of nuclear reactors and looking at future possibilities of building fusion reactors. Also discusing the posibility of cold fusion and some diferent uses for nuclear energy like atom and hydrogen bombs.

projects.description: Central information system and social network for student organisation eSTUDENT. High level PHP programming including large amount of AJAX and web design. Including database management and email server management.

name: Faculty of Electrical and Computer Engineering
title: Masters degree in Software Engineering and Information Systems

projects.name: Seminar
projects.description: Mobile applications for Autistic children. General information about Autism and problems people with disabilities face every day. Review of iOS and Android applications that could enable easier communication for autistic children.

projects.name: Project
projects.description: Maintaining, debugging and adding new features for a program created for designing digital lectures. It required C# and GUI design knowledge.

projects.name: Master thesis
projects.description: Complete design and implementation of software solution for designing, publishing and using digital lectures intended to be used in work with Autistic children. This included Web based designer of digital lectures created with modern web technologies as a single page web application, Java based backend application using REST framework formanagement of lectures, users and resources, and a mobile application built using webtechnologies and packed with PhoneGap for Android. It also included working closely withexperts form Autism centre in Zagreb to get their feedback that proved to be invaluable in thedevelopment process.
